import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect, useDispatch, } from 'react-redux' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils.js' import './header.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
) } export default connect()(Header)
